hero.badge: Live Learning Sessions for Ecommerce Growth
hero.title: Master Your Reporting & Alerts
hero.description: Join our expert-led webinars to discover how thinkr's AI solutions can transform your Shopify store operations, boost sales, and streamline your workflow.

content.title: What Will We Cover in Our AI-Powered E-commerce Webinar?
content.description: Join our expert-led session where in just 40 minutes, you'll discover how to transform from reactive spreadsheet juggling to masterful AI-powered automation. Learn how to chat with your data, set up proactive alerts, and automate reporting to reclaim up to 16 hours per week.
topics: Introduction to AI-Powered Automation for E-commerce
Your Automated 24/7 Watchdog: AI Agents and Proactive Alerts
Automated Reporting: Goodbye Spreadsheets, Hello Freedom
Live Demo: Setting Up Your First Automated Report in Under 5 Minutes
Q&A Session with thinkr AI Automation Experts

bonus.title: Bonus: Exclusive Access
bonus.description: All attendees will receive a free 14-day trial of thinkr's AI automation platform and a comprehensive "From Reactive to Masterful" implementation guide valued at $297.

speakers.title: Who Will Be the Speakers?
speakers.subtitle: You have at your disposal our dream team in this super informative webinar.

edu.name: Edu Samayoa
edu.title: Co-Founder & CEO
edu.description: Will lead this transformative webinar session and demonstrate how AI automation can revolutionize your e-commerce operations. With deep expertise in building AI solutions for Shopify stores, Edu brings real-world insights from helping hundreds of e-commerce businesses scale efficiently. He'll show you exactly how to implement AI-powered automation that saves time, boosts sales, and eliminates the manual work that's holding your business back.

guest.name: Special Guest
guest.title: AI & E-commerce Expert
guest.description: We have a very special surprise guest joining us for this exclusive webinar! This industry expert will share unique insights and real-world case studies that you won't find anywhere else. Stay tuned to discover who will be sharing their expertise on AI automation and e-commerce optimization.
